item.title: [node.js] #1 node-gyp: xcode-select error
item.description: 今天在練習編譯node-gyp，結果編譯時產生問題 xcode-select: error: tool 'xcodebuild' requires Xcode, but active developer directory '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools' is a command line tools instance 解決方法可以參考node-gyp #539。 基本解決方法就
